example.text: The Administration’s negligence has put the burden on our border towns, humanitarian groups, and local law enforcement. I’m disappointed that they’ve squandered the time they’ve had to prepare for the lifting of Title 42. My full statement below: ? ? [[url]]

This morning I met with [[user]] and a bipartisan group of lawmakers from the House and Senate to discuss efforts to crack down on fentanyl trafficking. Keeping this deadly drug out of our communities is going to take a coordinated, international response. [[url]]

This morning I met with [[user]] and a bipartisan group of lawmakers from the House and Senate to discuss efforts to crack down on fentanyl trafficking. Keeping this deadly drug out of our communities is going to take a coordinated, international response. [[url]]

It's been nearly two years since the House passed the Equality Act, which would protect LGBTQ+ people from being denied housing, education, or the chance to serve on a jury because of their sexual orientation or gender identity. Now it's time for the Senate to do the same.
